bullets.text: Airtable linked record fields cannot be filtered by record ID using filterByFormula with ARRAYJOIN - it returns display values (primary field), not record IDs. Fetch all records and filter client-side by checking if the linked field array includes the target record ID.

Airtable formula fields may return dates in European DD/MM/YYYY format. Parse and convert to ISO YYYY-MM-DD in the API transform layer to avoid JavaScript Date parsing issues (JS interprets slashes as MM/DD/YYYY).
